node.title: I can afford to spend so much time at the Monastery because:
node.choices: I got rich using Perl before the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dot-com_bubble|bubble] burst I work from home With my dectupled productivity (thanks to Perl), I only need to work 1 hour per day Parents' basement... 'nuff said I'm independently wealthy Sugar daddy/momma my name's ____, and I'm an addict Perl is critical to my job and I can't afford not to I'm unemployed (because I spent too much time at PerlMonks) $other{reason}
